QuestData.Title: Kill or Be Killed
QuestData.Description: The reefs have always protected us from a coastal attack. The earthquakes must've opened a passage for the Forsaken ships.$B$BQuick, $n. Slow down the attackers while I get the rest of the militia ready.$B$BI think I can hear the Prince and some of our men engaging the Forsaken even as we speak. Speak to Liam and see how you can be of use.$B$BOh... and make sure he doesn't get himself killed. I'm afraid he might be a little reckless in his current state.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Prince Liam Greymane outside of Duskhaven.
QuestData.RewardText: $n!!! You ARE alive!$B$BI thought I was having dreams about the old days when I heard your voice...
